first_translate: I felt so lonely...

hangle: 누군가 날 필요로 해주면 좋겠다고 생각했다.
first_translate: all I wanted... ...was for somebody to need me.

hangle: 이 벌레만도 못한 목숨이라도 의미가 있을까?
first_translate: would this wretched existence finally mean something if they did?

hangle: 시간이 지나고, 용병단은 헤일론 영지의 방어를 맡게 되었다.
first_translate: time passed by, and our mercenary group took on the task of defending hailon territory from monsters.
fighting them was dangerous, but at least we got paid well.

hangle: 나는 제대로 된 무기도 받지 못하고,
first_translate: even though I didn’t receive any proper weapons,
I managed to get through battles using swords I picked up off dead bodies.

hangle: 끝도 없는 고단한 싸움의 좋은 점이 있다면
first_translate: the only good thing about these endless fights is probably...
...that I’ve become stronger after fighting for my life all those times.
I survived.
but eventually, disaster struck.
we’re being pushed back!
retreat immediately!
it’s time to fall back!

hangle: 거기서 뭐 하는 거냐! 굼뜬 자식!
first_translate: what are you doing?! move your ass, kid!!
if he can’t do anything else,
at least make him into a human shield!
siegren must live.
siegren has to stay alive.
stay alive...
I endured everything just to survive.
but no matter how much better I became,
my abilities were still lacking.
is this really the end?
for some reason, I feel relieved.
the one thing that bothers me is...

hangle: 그딴 쓰레기 같은 놈을 대신해 죽는다는 거다.
first_translate: ...the fact that I’m dying instead of that piece of trash.
if I had to give my life for anyone,

hangle: 나와 비슷한 처지의 사람을 구하고 싶었는데…
first_translate: I would rather save people like myself--

hangle: 그래. 좀 더 도움이 필요한 사람,
first_translate: that's right. I want to lend a hand...
...to weaker people who desperately need help more than others.

hangle: 왜냐면 내가 고독했을 때는 누구도 도움을 주지 않았으니까.
first_translate: no one helped me when I needed it most.

hangle: 그러니 적어도 나는 도움을 주고 싶었어.
first_translate: and because of that, I wish to offer aid whenever possible.

hangle: 누군가 나처럼 살지 않기를 바라는 건 나약해.
first_translate: hoping that nobody will go through what I went through makes me weak.

hangle: 그런 생각이나 하니 결국 이렇게 죽는 거야.
first_translate: this kind of thinking is why I ended up here today.

hangle: 그래도 내 소망이 헛된 게 아니라고 믿고 싶어.
first_translate: but I’d like to believe that my wishes weren’t futile.
maybe there’ll come a day where hope shines bright again.

hangle: 아니면 내가 누군가의 빛이 되고 싶어.
first_translate: or maybe someday, I'll be able to shine light onto other people's lives as well.
of course, now that won’t ever happen.

hangle: 누군가 어둠 속에서 내 머리를 쓰다듬는다.
first_translate: someone gently caresses my hair while I'm surrounded by darkness.
their touch feels warm enough to bring tears to my eyes...
where am I...?
huh? wait...
a girl...?
in that moment,

hangle: 지긋지긋했던 내 인생에서 가장 평화로운 광경이었다.
first_translate: I saw the most peaceful sight of my entire miserable life.
doesn’t it hurt anymore?
let me see.
stop touching me without permission.
but...!
